  • Method Details

    • withCurrency

      public BulkInvoiceBuilder withCurrency(Currency currency)

    • withExchangeRate

      public BulkInvoiceBuilder withExchangeRate(ExchangeRate rate)
      Deprecated.
      You can keep using this method if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter. If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please replace all usages of this method with one of the variants that work with an ExchangeRateInUse instance. For more information, please see the product documentation.

    • withExchangeRate

      @Deprecated public BulkInvoiceBuilder withExchangeRate(ValueGenerator<ExchangeRate> rateGenerator)
      Deprecated.
      You can keep using this method if you have set the 'UseDeprecatedExchangeRates' property to true, and are continuing to use the legacy exchange rate implementation provided in older versions of ClaimCenter. If you are migrating to use the new FXRate implementation, please replace all usages of this method with one of the variants that work with an ExchangeRateInUse instance. For more information, please see the product documentation.

    • withPayeeAndRelatedFields

      public BulkInvoiceBuilder withPayeeAndRelatedFields(ContactBuilder payee)
      Uses the given payee to populate not just the payee field, but also the pay to and mail to fields (from the payee's display name) and the mail to address field (from the payee's primary address)
      Parameters:
      payee - contact builder that will build the payee
      Returns:
      the builder

    • withPayeeAndRelatedFields

      public BulkInvoiceBuilder withPayeeAndRelatedFields(Contact payee)
      Uses the given payee to populate not just the payee field, but also the pay to and mail to fields (from the payee's display name) and the mail to address field (from the payee's primary address)
      Parameters:
      payee - the payee as a contact, must have a non null primary address
      Returns:
      the builder

    • uiReadyBulkInvoice

      public static BulkInvoiceBuilder uiReadyBulkInvoice()
      Creates a BulkInvoiceBuilder with no items. Default values:
      • Currency: Default Currency
      • Invoice number: selected using INVOICE_NUMBER_GENERATOR
      • Requesting user: applegate
      • Received date: today
      • Bulk Invoice total: 0
      • Total reporting amount: 0
      • Total transaction amount: 0
      • Approved reporting amount: 0
      • Approved transaction amount: 0
      • Scheduled send date: today
      • Payment method: check
      • Payee (with related fields populated): Hans Moleman
      • Status: Draft
      Returns:
      the BulkInvoiceBuilder

    • uiReadyBulkInvoice

      public static BulkInvoiceBuilder uiReadyBulkInvoice(Currency currency)
      Creates a BulkInvoiceBuilder with no items. Default values:
      • Invoice number: selected using INVOICE_NUMBER_GENERATOR
      • Requesting user: applegate
      • Received date: today
      • Bulk Invoice total: 0
      • Total reporting amount: 0
      • Total transaction amount: 0
      • Approved reporting amount: 0
      • Approved transaction amount: 0
      • Scheduled send date: today
      • Payment method: check
      • Payee (with related fields populated): Hans Moleman
      • Status: Draft
      Returns:
      the BulkInvoiceBuilder
